SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.common.mobileAuthorization.impl.MobileMenuMapper.selectMobileMenuList] 20191028 - KR HAN */ 'Lvl'||MENU_LVL DIV ,MENU_CODE ,MENU_NAME ,PGM_CODE ,PGM_NAME ,MENU_LVL ,MENU_ORDER ,UPPER_MENU_CODE ,MENU_ICON_NM ,PAGE_PATH ,USE_YN ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ,CASE WHEN (User2.USER_ID IS NOT NULL) THEN User2.USER_NAME ELSE '' END AS UPD_USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(UPD_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') UPD_DT FROM MOB0002M t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M User2 ON User2.USER_ID = t1.UPD_USER_ID
AND (UPPER(MENU_CODE) LIKE UPPER(#{menuCode}) || '%' OR UPPER(MENU_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{menuCode}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(PGM_CODE) LIKE UPPER(#{pgmCode}) || '%' OR UPPER(PGM_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{pgmCode}) || '%')
START WITH t1.UPPER_MENU_CODE IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR t1.MENU_CODE = t1.UPPER_MENU_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY t1.MENU_ORDER

SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.common.mobileAuthorization.impl.MobileMenuMapper.selectMobileMenuPopList] 20191028 - KR HAN */ DISTINCT MENU_CODE , MENU_NAME , PGM_CODE , PGM_NAME , MENU_LVL FROM MOB0002M
AND MENU_LVL = #{menuLvl}
AND UPPER(MENU_CODE) LIKE UPPER(#{menuCdNm}) || '%'
AND UPPER(MENU_NAME) LIKE UPPER(#{menuCdNm}) || '%'
AND MENU_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT MENU_CODE FROM MOB0003M WHERE AUTH_CODE = #{authCd} )
ORDER BY MENU_CODE
